title: Virtual Ecosystem Exploration: Game-Based Environmental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic ecology and environmental concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing VR technology and desktop-based simulations

learning_goals: Learners can explain the ecological behaviors (feeding activity, reproduction, habitat characteristics) of the Taipei tree frog with 80% accuracy in a virtual ecosystem
Learners can creatively propose environmental problem-solving strategies at least three times through game-based simulations
Learners can write a comprehensive report (over 10 pages) including ecosystem conservation measures as a project deliverable
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
